'''17w49b''' is the tenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on December 7, 2017<ref name=17w49b>{{snap|17w49a|December 6, 2017}}</ref>, which added [[Function (Java Edition)|function]] tags.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added tags for functions.
** Functions tagged in <code>minecraft:tick</code> runs every tick at the beginning of the tick.
* Added block and item tags for <code>buttons</code>, <code>carpets</code>, <code>doors</code>, <code>logs</code>, <code>saplings</code>, and <code>stone_bricks</code> to the vanilla data pack.
* Added a block tag for <code>flower_pots</code> to the vanilla data pack.
* When overriding a tag, players now append instead of replacing.
* [[Advancement]] item predicates now support item tags.

== Changes ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|gamerule}}'''
* Removed the <code>gameLoopFunction</code> gamerule in favor of functions tagged in <code>minecraft:tick</code>.
